column2: "Judahen Ahazia ne ba Joas n'afe a otsia eduonu ebiasa no mu no
column3: na Jehu ne ba Jehoahaz hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel do wɔ Samaria

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: na odzii Nebat ne ba Jeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no no ne ndzeyɛɛ bɔn ekyir; na oemmfi ho emmfir."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ Israel do
column3: na oyii hɔn hyɛɛ Siriahen Hazael nsa
column4: na Hazael ne ba Ben-hadad nsa daa."

column2: "Na Jehoahaz paa EWURADZE kyɛw
column3: na EWURADZE tsiee no: osiandɛ ohun Israel hɔn atseetsee
column4: mbrɛ Siriahen no sii tseetsee hɔn."

column2: "(Na EWURADZE maa Israel ɔgyefo bi ma wofii Siriafo nsa ase firii: na Israelmba no tsenatsenaa hɔn asesee mu
"Naaso woemmfi Jeroboam fi no bɔn a ɔdze maa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no ho
column3: na wɔnantsewee wɔ mu: na wogyaa Asera so wɔ Samaria.)"

column2: "Nna Jehoahaz nnyi akofo dɔm biara gyedɛ mpɔnkɔdofo eduonum
column4: na anamɔnmufo mpemdu; osiandɛ Siriahen no sɛɛ hɔn
column5: na ɔyɛɛ hɔn dɛ ewuporowee do huntuma."

column2: "Afei Jehoahaz no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column5: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Jehoahaz kɔr ne nsamankyir; na wosiee no wɔ Samaria: na ne babanyin Joas dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
"Judahen Joas n'afe a otsia eduasa esuon no mu nna Jehoahaz ne ba Jehoas hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel do wɔ Samaria na odzii hen mfe duesia."
"Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do; oemmfi Nebat ne ba Jeroboam no bɔn nyinara a ɔdze maa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no ho emmfi: na ɔnantsewee wɔ mu."
"Afei Jehoas no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column4: na ne mbanyinndam a nye Judahen Amazia koe no
column5: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Jehoas kɔr ne nsamankyir; na Jeroboam tsenaa n'ahengua do: na wokesiee Jehoas wɔ Samaria kaa Israel ahemfo no ho."
"Afei na Elisha yar yarba a ɔdze no robɔkɔ nsamankyir: na Israelhen Jehoas sianee baa ne nkyɛn bosuu no
column6: ɔwo a ayɛ Israel ntseaseanam na no mpɔnkɔdofo e!"

column2: "Na Elisha see no dɛ
column3: Kɛfa egyen na egyen menaba: na ɔkɛfaa egyen na egyen menaba brɛɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔsee Israelhen no dɛ
column3: Fa wo nsa to egyen no do: na ɔdze ne nsa too do. Na Elisha dze ne nsa guu ɔhen no ne nsa do."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Bue boka afamu tokura no: na obuei. Nna Elisha see dɛ
column4: Tow: na ɔtowee. Na ɔsee dɛ
column6: mekyerɛ Siria do konyimdzi egyen menaba: osiandɛ ebɔbobɔ Siriafo wɔ Afek araa ma ahyew hɔn ana."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Tase egyen menaba no: na ɔtasee. Na ɔsee Israelhen no dɛ
column4: Tow bɔ famu: na ɔtowee bɔɔ famu mprɛnsa

column2: "Na Nyame nyimpa no no bo fuuw no
column4: Nkyɛ ɔsɛ dɛ etow mpɛn enum anaa esia; ɔno na nkyɛ ebɔbɔ Siria araa ma ahyew no: na afei dze mprɛnsa ara pɛr na ibedzi Siria do konyim."

column2: "Na Elisha wui
column3: na wosiee no. Afei afe bae no Moabfo ekuwekuw botuaa asaase no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column6: wohun Moabfo kuw bi; na wɔtoow nyimpa no kyeen Elisha ne nda no no mu na woguanee: na ntsɛmara a fun no kɛkaa Elisha ne mbiew no

column2: "Na Siriahen Hazael tseetsee Israel wɔ Jehoahaz ne nda nyinara mu."
"Na EWURADZE kyerɛɛ ayamuyie wɔ Israelfo no do na ohun hɔn mbɔbɔr
column8: nkyii so ɔanntow hɔn emmfi n'enyim enngu araa nye ndɛ."

column2: "Na Siriahen Hazael wui; na ne babanyin Ben-hadad dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
"Na Jehoahaz ne ba Jehoas kɛgyee Hazael ne ba Ben-hadad ne nsamu nkurow no a ɔdze akodzi gyee no wɔ n'egya Jehoahaz ne nsamu no. Mpɛn ebiasa na Joas dzii no do konyim no
column3: na ɔdaan Israel nkurow no bae."
